advisory.name: RLBA-2022:1560
advisory.topic: An update for the pki-core:10.6 module is now available for Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation EnterpriseLinux 8.
advisory.description: The Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) Core contains fundamental packages required by Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation Certificate System.

fixes.description: ipa: ERROR: 'Certificate operation cannot be completed: Unable to communicate with CMS (403)
